question.title: Parts of Google Pay api no longer exist and I cant work aroud a solution to add and Initialize the google pay button
question.body:
I dont really know what to do, I have been trying to set up google pay for my app so that the user could checkout, but this doesnt seem to work, i was able to add the google pay button to my xml:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    xmlns:wallet="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:background="#303030"
    >
<LinearLayout>

<com.google.android.gms.wallet.button.PayButton
            android:id="@+id/google_pay_buttonLL"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            />
    </LinearLayout>


</LinearLayout>

I am following the documentaion which says to create a checkout activity, i do the same but in the end of the documentation they give their full code fore CechoutActivity and in the imports you can see:

import com.google.android.gms.samples.pay.R;
import com.google.android.gms.samples.pay.databinding.ActivityCheckoutBinding;
import com.google.android.gms.samples.pay.util.PaymentsUtil;
import com.google.android.gms.samples.pay.viewmodel.CheckoutViewModel;

all of which DO NOT EXIST, yet they play vital role in the whole checkout activity.

I have found a solution to something similar, in my PaymentsUtil file, as i followed the doc, they sayed to use some sort of CONSTANTS in createPaymentClient, later i found it should be replaced with WalletAConstants, but i still dont know what to replace the imports above with. I have looked all aroud the internet but to no avail, i have tried adding viewBinding and dataBinding and other stuff to my gradle file:

buildFeatures {
        viewBinding true
        dataBinding true
    }

    viewBinding {
        enabled true
    }

...

dependencies {
    implementation 'com.google.android.gms:play-services-wallet:19.4.0'
    implementation "com.google.android.gms:play-services-pay:16.5.0"

heres a link to the documentation:Google Pay api Thanks to anybody who can help
